text: Gerard Appelmans was a 13th-century hermit in the Low Countries who wrote a theologically and linguistically innovative mystical gloss on the Our Father entitled Glose op den pater noster.Stephanus Axters, "Appelmans, Gerard", Nationaal Biografisch Woordenboek vol. 1 (Brussels, 1964), 43-44. This treatise is part of a manuscript now in the Royal Library of Belgium, MS 3067–73, folios 143-151v.J. Van den Gheyn, Catalogue des Manuscrits de la Bibliothèque Royale de Belgique, vol. 3 (Brussels, 1903), no. 2362:25. It was edited and published in 1927.L. Reypens, "Gheraert Appelmans' Glose op het Vaderons", Ons Geestelijk Erf, 1 (1927), pp. 83-107. ==References== Category:13th-century writers Category:Roman Catholic mystics Category:Flemish Christian mystics Category:13th-century Christian mystics
title: Gerard Appelmans
